text: La Princesse de Clèves () is a 1961 French-Italian drama film based on the 1678 novel of the same name. ==Cast== * Marina Vlady – La princesse de Clèves * Jean Marais – Le prince de Clèves * Jean-François Poron – Jacques, Duke of Nemours * Henri Piégay – Le vidame de Chartres * Annie Ducaux – Diane de Poitiers * Lea Padovani – Catherine de' Medici ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960s historical drama films Category:French historical drama films Category:Italian historical drama films Category:Italian films Category:Cultural depictions of Catherine de' Medici Category:Films based on works by Madame de La Fayette Category:Films directed by Jean Delannoy Category:Films scored by Georges Auric Category:Films with screenplays by Jean Cocteau Category:French films Category:Films set in the 16th century Category:1961 drama films
title: La Princesse de Clèves (film)
